activation.reactionTrigger: Fall due to a failed Acrobatics or Athletics check

system.description:
Also at 3rd level, you can wall run (running along the edge of a vertical surface) up to 10 feet without falling, and as long as there is a solid surface at the beginning and ending points of your move, you can run across pipes, wires, ropes, vines, or anything else that will support your weight without slowing down and without having to make any checks.

Finally, if you would fall due to a failed Acrobatics or Athletics check, you can use your reaction to spend a point of exertion and grab onto something, immediately ending your turn. This may impose additional complications (such as being stranded or needing another check to get onto solid ground) at the Narratorâ€™s discretion.
